history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER public transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where do you wanna go? For example, you can say I'm going to Murray and Forbes
USER CMU
TTS Okay, going to carnegie mellon university. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where are you leaving from?
USER Airport
TTS Okay, leaving from pittsburgh international airport. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you wanna travel?
USER map
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER mouth
TTS When do you wanna travel?
USER at 12 p.m.
TTS Okay, travelling at 12:00 pm.
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak>There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 1 hour 8 minutes, and you will take 1 bus.<break time='800ms'/>If you would like to go by driving instead, please say start over, and then choose driving directions.<break time='800ms'/>
Take the 28X ,to Forbes avenue Opposite Craig Street It will depart at 12:30pm.<break time='800ms'/>
Walk for about 3 mins to 5000 Forbes avenue.<break time='800ms'/>
TTS <speak>if you missed anything, please say repeat, else say continue</speak>
USER Dean you
TTS <speak>if you missed anything, please say repeat, else say continue</speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> Were the provided directions useful? </speak>
USER empty now
TTS <speak> Would you use GetGoing again? </speak>
